overview: Sweetheart proudly presents superstar Brandi Love in a sizzling All-MILF showcase, featuring Brandi's dirtiest desires coming true! Brandi has handpicked her co-stars to deliver passionate sex in 4 scenarios which were chosen by fans. Brandi dominates sex slave Cherie DeVille, gives Brianna Banks the ultimate Girlfriend Experience for the night, plays Barbie to Dana Vespoli's twisted Raquel, and revisits her character as Senator Jen Hanlon falling in love with Julia Ann's Justice Beth Pellegrino.
title: Brandi Loves MILFs
